Issue.creator: yuki-kon
Issue.summary: Fix typo in README.md for configtxlator

command.args: ... Utility for generating Hyperledger Fabric channel configurations Flags: --help Show context-sensitive help (also try --help-long and --help-man). Commands: help ... Show help. start Start the configtxlator REST server version Show version information {code} We need to fix the starting command like the below. {code:java} $ configtxlator start {code} >
